nodes.text: The Serendipity, formerly known as the Miss Fortune, was a 1550-LEX yacht owned by Delia Leighton. The yacht featured a cantina inside its cargo hold and operated on planets such as Cyrkon and Jakku. The Serendipity's cantina hosted numerous patrons, so Leighton hired a Shistavanen bouncer named Curtis to verify its guests.
The Serendipity first appeared in the junior novel Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure, which was written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
